textAfterTable: You can check the progress of the submitted requests at https://accounts.itsc.cuhk.edu.hk/websql.dir/aims/pr_sre.html. Top of Page 2. Computing Account Extension Leaving staff can apply for computing account extension for the sake of job handover. Please click here for the application form. Top of Page 3. Account Information You can check basic information of your accounts such as the status and expiry date (if applicable) in the Account Information Management System. Top of Page 4.
